text: Holopogon gaudissartii is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is endemic to China. == Sources == * China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Holopogon gaudissartii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Endemic orchids of China Gaudissartii Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Holopogon gaudissartii
